name: Point of the Stag
flavor_text: Gore befalls those who do not respect the hart.

frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon
